author: admin
title: Pro-Biafran agitators adopt new political party for Biafran states - NAIJ.COM
text: Pro-Biafran agitators adopt new political party for Biafran states - NAIJ.COM NAIJ.COM Leaders of pro-Biafran organizations across the world met over the weekend to adopt the United Progressive Party (UPP) as Biafra’s national party in Nigeria . The groups in a meeting in Enugu, where they were hosted by the UPP, led by its national …
